problem_text: The area of \parallelogram A B C D is 150 square meters. The area of \parallelogram F G H J is 54 square meters. If \parallelogram A B C D \sim \parallelogram F G H J, find the value of x.
compact_text: The area of \parallelogram ABCD is 150 square meters. The area of \parallelogram FGHJ is 54 square meters. If \parallelogram ABCD \sim \parallelogram FGHJ, find the value of x.
annotat_text: The area of $▱ A B C D$ is 150 square meters. The area of $▱ F G H J$ is 54 square meters. If $▱ A B C D \sim ▱ F G H J$, find the value of $x$.
